definition: arrow/dart/straight/to vow/to swear/old variant of 屎[shi3]
lit. compass and set square/fig. established standard/rule/customs/practices/fig. upright and honest/well-behaved
to follow the compass and go with the set square (idiom); to follow the rules inflexibly/to act according to convention
to behave oneself/to abide by the rules
to follow the compass and go with the set square (idiom); to follow the rules inflexibly/to act according to convention
compasses, set square and straight line marker (idiom); fig. established standard/norms/criteria
without rules, nothing can be done (idiom, from Mencius); one must follow some rules
pinyin: bu4 yi3 gui1 ju5 , bu4 neng2 cheng2 fang1 yuan2

definition: conforming with the norms of society

sentences.english: The most radical of the new approaches uses "quadrupole resonance technology".
sentences.chinese: 最引人注目的新方法是使用“四极矩共振技术”。

sentences.english: Furthermore, we can detect the arrival time of wavefront by making use of WD moment characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 此外，利用WD的矩特性，可以检测波首的到达时。

sentences.english: Moments after the Wheatfield Battle begins, the first bodies are down on the field.
sentences.chinese: 矩麦田战斗开始后，第一个机构是在球场上下来。

sentences.english: A unified second order moment model of turbulent combustion is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种湍流燃烧统一二阶矩模型。

sentences.english: The estimation of noise covariance matrix is based on iterative procedure in ML.
sentences.chinese: 最大似然法采用了迭代的方法来估计噪声的协方差矩。

sentences.english: The alignment of photofragment is described by molecular state multipoles.
sentences.chinese: 光碎片的取向由分子态多极矩描述。

sentences.english: The electronic structure, OPA and TPA properties were studied in detail.
sentences.chinese: 研究了具有三分支结构的八极矩分子和低聚物。

sentences.english: Conditions for the fourth-order ergodicity are given.
sentences.chinese: 对于四阶矩估计，给出了四阶遍历条件。

sentences.english: The second theorem defines the Equivalent Magnetic Charge and the Moment of Current Density.
sentences.chinese: 第二个定理定义了“等效磁荷”与‘电流密度矩’。

sentences.english: The reentry performance of moving-mass actuated kinetic warheads is discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对基于质量矩技术的机动弹头再入性能进行了探讨。

sentences.english: The quality statistic is a monotonous function of a method of moments estimator of the unreliability.
sentences.chinese: 质量统计是不可靠度的矩估计的严格增加函数。

sentences.english: The fraxin concentration time data were analyzed with statistical moment theory.
sentences.chinese: 药物浓度时间数据采用非隔室统计矩原理进行分析。

sentences.english: We present the exact solutions for the first and second moments.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出了相关的一阶矩和二阶矩的解析解。

definition: conforming with the norms of society
the Doctrine of the Mean, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1]
everything steady and stable (idiom); overcautious and unimaginary
to follow the compass and go with the set square (idiom); to follow the rules inflexibly/to act according to convention
Fangzheng county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang
doctrine of the mean/moderation in all things
lit. carpenter's straight line marker/same as 墨斗/fig. rules/rules and regulations
